representativeInfo.name: Gil-Bar Industries (JCI Rep)
representativeInfo.contact: Matt Neumann (NJ) / Joe Cohen (NY) / Ian Sorenson (NY)

suppliers.compatibilityNotes: Basis of design specified in project documents. Provides specified 350 ton capacity, energy efficiency of 1.05 kW/ton, and includes required features such as VFDs and integral pump module with dual pumps.

SUGGESTED ALTERNATIVE: Helical rotary screw compressor technology with comparable efficiency ratings. Available with VFD options, dual refrigerant circuits, and can be configured with similar pump packages to match specifications.

SUGGESTED ALTERNATIVE: AquaForce series offers similar capacity range and can be configured with VFDs and integrated hydronic packages to match specifications. Screw compressor technology with good part-load performance.
SUGGESTED ALTERNATIVE: Pathfinder series offers high efficiency with VFD-driven screw compressors. Can be configured with similar pump packages and dual-circuit design for redundancy.
SUGGESTED ALTERNATIVE: European manufacturer with growing US presence. NRB series offers high efficiency and quiet operation with screw compressors. Available with integrated hydronic packages.
SUGGESTED ALTERNATIVE: AWS series offers good efficiency with semi-hermetic screw compressors. Available with VFD options and dual-circuit design for redundancy.
